content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=-15.0, y=-50.0)
Consists of burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a chest at position(x=-16.5, y=-49.5)

### Coal mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a chest at position(x=43.5, y=-82.5)

### Copper plate factory
No structures found

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into entities
- Ensure the entity can accept the item being inserted before attempting insertion
- Check if the entity has available space for the item being inserted

### Errors when using entities that require fuel
- Ensure the entity has a sufficient fuel source before attempting to use it
- Check if the entity is out of fuel and needs to be refueled

### Errors when using entities that require input
- Ensure the entity has a sufficient input source before attempting to use it
- Check if the entity has no input liquid or fluid present in connections

### Errors when using chests that are full
- Empty the chest before attempting to continue mining or using the chest
- Check if the chest is full and needs to be emptied before proceeding
